item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, I am David Li and welcome to my personal site. Drop me message below if you’d like.

Media Recorder Polyfill * { padding: 0; margin: 0 } a { color: #009387 } a:visited { color: #930087 } body { margin: 1rem; font-family: sans-serif } main { max-width: 28rem; margin: 0 auto; position: relative } #controls { display: flex; margin-top: 2rem } button { flex-grow: 1; height: 2.5rem; min-width: 2rem; border: none; border-radius: .15rem; background: #00e5d2; margin-left: 2px; box-shadow: inset 0 -.15rem 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .
